item.title: AMAT
item.description: score:43 Chances: The semiconductor market is expected to grow by double digits in 2024. A jump in semiconductor equipment spending could supercharge this company that’s trading at an attractive valuation today. The artificial intelligence (AI) trade is alive and kicking. Companies tied to AI are rallying to start 2024 after a brief pullback.

item.title: S
item.description: score:20 Chances: The cybersecurity industry has been experiencing rapid growth, with increased demand for advanced technologies like AI for tackling next-generation threats. Risks: There have been significant insider sell transactions in SentinelOne Inc, which may raise concerns about the stock’s future performance.
